story.title: What's our Story?
story.content: No specific content was provided for this section on the website.

mission.title: What's our Mission?
mission.content: Our mission is to democratize access to top-tier cybersecurity education by offering free workshops and training sessions led by industry experts along with fun and parties. We strive to create an inclusive environment where students and aspiring professionals can learn, collaborate, and grow together, equipping them with the tools they need to succeed in the rapidly evolving cybersecurity landscape.

achievements.title: What's we Achieved?
achievements.content: Since our inception, Seasides's commitment to providing free, high-quality education has made a significant impact on the cybersecurity community, particularly among students.

teamMembers.name: Prashant KV
teamMembers.description: Over 20 years of experience in security. Known for helping others and 'throwing amazing parties'.

teamMembers.name: Parveen Yadav
teamMembers.description: Leads with empathy and accessibility. Active bug hunter on Hackerone & Bugcrowd with extensive cybersecurity expertise.

teamMembers.name: Pankaj Upadhyay
teamMembers.description: Technical expert contributing to the conference organization and cybersecurity education.

teamMembers.name: Arun Mishra
teamMembers.description: Cybersecurity specialist focused on advancing security education and practices.

teamMembers.name: Honey Merrin Sam
teamMembers.description: Program manager ensuring smooth execution of conference activities and workshops.

teamMembers.name: Narendra
teamMembers.description: Operations leader managing the logistical aspects of the conference.

teamMembers.name: Abhinav Khanna
teamMembers.description: Information Security Professional with 6+ years experience. Expertise in web apps, mobile apps, APIs, and cloud. Spoken at conferences like BlackHat Asia and BlackHat MEA.

teamMembers.name: Parag Dave
teamMembers.description: Technology advisor providing strategic guidance on cybersecurity trends and technologies.

teamMembers.name: Sunita Sharma
teamMembers.description: Community manager fostering engagement and building connections within the cybersecurity community.

teamMembers.name: Ashish Huria
teamMembers.description: Security consultant providing expert advice on cybersecurity implementations and best practices.

teamMembers.name: Seedon Adlin D'souza
teamMembers.description: Hardware security expert with 7+ years experience. Speaks at conferences on drone security, RF hacking, and hardware exploitation. Currently works at Sony and contributes to conference badge and village design.

teamMembers.name: Kartheek Lade
teamMembers.description: Security researcher focusing on Internet of Vehicles (IoV). Technical committee member for ASRG Vulnerability Management and regular speaker at international security conferences.

teamMembers.name: Devendra Kumar Sinha
teamMembers.description: Security architect designing robust security frameworks and architectures for the cybersecurity community.
